verbs.description: [ARG1: ashes ashes] at [ARG1: every major league ballpark jeff hall] [V: set] off [ARGM-PRP: to spread his brother ashes at every major league ballpark] and no one was supposed to know about it that included the incident at fenway where the ashes were spread in a different way hall tells podcastone sports now co - hosts jim litke and tim dahlberg that he completed his mission earlier this year and that his brother ashes were spread in some unusual spots at various ballparks across the country hall said his biggest fear was he would be caught spreading the ashes and banned from the park but that he was able to even spread them in fair territory in some parks jim litke lebron james tim dahlberg 1988 world series jeff hall nfl kirk gibson national basketball association rams 49ers kingdom of spain napoleonic nba 49ers band spain
